itunes:title: Daniel Week 2 with Jen Wilkin
title: Daniel Week 2 with Jen Wilkin
description:
For the second week of our Daniel series, Raechel and Amanda talk with author, Bible teacher, and biblical literacy advocate, Jen Wilkin. As they brave the book of Daniel, they continuously come back to one simple question that provides clarity and understanding for beginning Bible readers and biblical scholars alike. Whether reading familiar stories like Daniel in the lions’ den or wading through the often uncharted waters of biblical prophecy, they rejoice in the truth that Scripture is not only “for them and for then, but for us and for always.”

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Daniel reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Daniel Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/daniel-week-2-with-jen-wilkin/

For advertising opportunities or general podcast inquiries, email us.
